english.segment1: I am scared to move. From this frame of mind, afraid to lose. And I always try to find. Endless ways to hide my face from You
english.segment2: But You say. Dont be afraid, and dont feel ashamed. Youre one breath away from the life youre meant to lead. Fearlessly
english.segment3: Now its time to give. Every thought to You, so I can finally live. Cause theres no fear in love. Theres only hope in You. And Youre the one to pull me through. You pull me through
english.segment4: When youre scared, and you cant see. I am here to bring you peace. When youre lost and out of reach. I am here, I am here. When youre scared, and you cant see I am here to give you peace. When youre lost and out of reach. I am here, I am here to give you peace I am here to give you peace
english.segment5: Now I wont be afraid. I wont feel ashamed. I am one breath away from the life Im meant to lead. So I wont be afraid. No, I wont be ashamed. I am one breath away from the life Im meant to lead. Fearlessly
